name: Operation Air Assault 2
storyline:
The threat from international terrorism is at its peak and must be terminated!
As an elite military pilot you have been selected to join a covert helicopter crew tasked with locating terrorist splinter cells and eradicating them.

The military's most advanced strike helicopters are at your disposal, armed to the teeth with awesome firepower. The future of human civilisation rests on your shoulders!

Unleash a huge arsenal of devastating weaponry, including homing missiles, rockets and cannons.
Over 20 breathtaking missions set in a variety of combat zones including arid deserts and tropical jungles.
Pilot state-of-the-art attack helicopters and take out enemy tanks, gunboats, helicopters, AA-Guns and machinegun nests.
Undertake hair-raising mercy missions behind enemy lines to rescue innocent civilians.
summary:
The threat from international terrorism has never been greater. When an intelligence report highlights the disturbing prospect that a radical militia group may have access to nuclear weapons the very fabric of our society is under threat. A war is imminent, fortunately at the forefront of your arsenal is an all-new attack helicopter and when the call comes to wage war against the enemy there is only one pilot for the job.

Operation Air Assault is a fast-paced 3D attack helicopter game and your mission is to seek and destroy the radical militia using the most technologically devastating weaponry at your disposal. The war on terror is a reality. Fight the war in Operation Air Assault.
